description:
http://anidb.net/ch93886 [Sachio] ends up injuring a Megalo-boxer after they caused trouble at http://anidb.net/ch115894 [Bonjiri]`s shop. In retaliation, the Megalo-boxer comes back and trashes the place and steals the deed to the shop.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Aunque estes consciente de tu impotencia, Dios te ofrecera su imagen para que la pises
Muryoku Da to Jikaku Shite mo, Kami wa Fumie o Sashidasu
無力だと自覚しても, 神は踏み絵を差し出す
